about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Winter 2021 Garden] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
Elegant Iron Fence
Cozy Checkered Rug
Glitter Reindeer Fence
Snowy Bushes
Twisted Trees (snowy)
Festive Red Edging
Edging Gift Boxes

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
